name: Good Night, Old Timer
description:
Somewhere on a service station in the Kuiper belt a man tries to leave it all behind and have a quiet, decent existence. He works for a living, honest labour with his hands. Sometimes he goes to a bar to relax over a few drinks and decent conversation. He seems harmless. 

This game auto-saves when you leave the page!

work in progress, eagerly awaiting your feedback

written by @mercurylegba
